mapper.select: SELECT c.cafe_no, cafe_name, cafe_image, cafe_address, cafe_comment, COALESCE(avg_cafe_star, 0) as avg_cafe_star FROM cafe c JOIN liked l ON c.cafe_no = l.cafe_no WHERE member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY cafe_reg DESC
select count(*) from liked where member_id = #{member_id}
select cafe_no from liked where cafe_no = #{cafe_no}
